        toInt

This is a library for Fixed-point numbers in Nim.

Types

DecimalStrategy = enum
  dsKeepMore, dsKeepLess
strategy when operating on 2 FixedPoints with different decimalPlaces either keep more decimalPlaces or less 
FixedPoint = object
  decimalPlaces: int
  number: int

Vars

defaultDecimalStrategy: DecimalStrategy = dsKeepMore

Procs

proc `$`(a: FixedPoint): string {....raises: [], tags: [].}
proc `*`(a, b: FixedPoint; decimalStrategy = defaultDecimalStrategy): FixedPoint {.
    ...raises: [ValueError], tags: [].}
proc `+`(a, b: FixedPoint; decimalStrategy = defaultDecimalStrategy): FixedPoint {.
    ...raises: [], tags: [].}
proc `-`(a: FixedPoint): FixedPoint {....raises: [], tags: [].}
proc `/`(a, b: FixedPoint; decimalStrategy = defaultDecimalStrategy): FixedPoint {.
    ...raises: [ValueError], tags: [].}
this converts to float and back and is thus a little slow 
proc `<`(a, b: FixedPoint): bool {....raises: [], tags: [].}
proc fixedPoint(a: float; decimalPlaces = 0): FixedPoint {....raises: [ValueError],
    tags: [].}
new FixedPoint from float with specified decimalPlaces decimalPlaces are inferred if == 0 this converts to string and back and thus is a little expensive 
proc fixedPoint(a: int; decimalPlaces: int): FixedPoint {....raises: [], tags: [].}
new FixedPoint from int with specified decimalPlaces 
proc fixedPoint(a: string): FixedPoint {....raises: [ValueError], tags: [].}
new FixedPoint from string, decimalPlaces are inferred 
proc fixedPoint(decimalPlaces: int): FixedPoint {....raises: [], tags: [].}
new FixedPoint with number=0, just specify decimalPlaces 
proc setDecimalPlaces(a: var FixedPoint; decimalPlaces: int) {....raises: [],
    tags: [].}
changes the number in a according to the new decimalPlaces 
proc toFloat(a: FixedPoint): float {....raises: [], tags: [].}

Templates

template `$$`(a: float; decimalPlaces = 0): FixedPoint
template `$$`(a: int; decimalPlaces: int): FixedPoint
template `$$`(a: string): FixedPoint
template `$$`(decimalPlaces: int): FixedPoint
template `*=`(a: var FixedPoint; b: FixedPoint;
              decimalStrategy = defaultDecimalStrategy)
template `+=`(a: var FixedPoint; b: FixedPoint;
              decimalStrategy = defaultDecimalStrategy)
template `-=`(a: var FixedPoint; b: FixedPoint;
              decimalStrategy = defaultDecimalStrategy)
template `-`(a, b: FixedPoint; decimalStrategy = defaultDecimalStrategy): FixedPoint
template `/=`(a: var FixedPoint; b: FixedPoint;
              decimalStrategy = defaultDecimalStrategy)
template `<=`(a, b: FixedPoint): bool
template `>=`(a, b: FixedPoint): bool
template `>`(a, b: FixedPoint): bool
template setDecimalPlaces(a: var FixedPoint; b: FixedPoint)
template toInt(a: FixedPoint): int
